subject: [HW 07] Master Thread
content:
HW 07 is released and will be due Thursday, November 07 at 11:59 pm.

Please post question-specific questions in their respective threads, and post general questions below (submitting, autograder, etc.). Come to office hours if you have any further questions. :) Good luck!

Q1: Longest increasing subsequence: @1893

Q2: Derive Sum: @1892

Q3: Derive Product: @1891

Q4: Make Exp: @1890

Q5: Derive Exp: @1889

threads.question: Whenever I try to run python3 editor, it says that Port 31415 is already in use and to go to  <http://localhost:31415> and stop the editor. But when I go to that link, it is just a page that says "The connector service is running." and there is nothing to click. What should I do to stop the editor?

follow-ups.feedback: I think running python editor -p 314156 and then going to 127.0.0.1:314156 should work
I think running python editor -p 314156 and then going to 127.0.0.1:314156 should work
I tried that and got this error:  OverflowError: getsockaddrarg: port must be 0-65535.  Then I tried "python editor -p 31415" and it gave me the same message as the very first time.
Try restarting your system and running normally

threads.question: Why do I get this when I try to test my code in ok?  ![](/redirect/s3?bucket=uploads&prefix=attach%2Fjziyku5gomy7aq%2Fjkvrmz5t48s3fx%2Fk2mw36mv4q7j%2FScreen_Shot_20191105_at_10.15.18_PM.png)

follow-ups.feedback: you are likely missing a parenthesis somewhere - check to make sure that every parenthesis has a matching pair where you expect it.

threads.question: Why is there no download link in the homework 7 page? How do I get the files?
![](/redirect/s3?bucket=uploads&prefix=attach%2Fjziyku5gomy7aq%2Fjzqdjezmdkd5jj%2Fk2osqq7q3do4%2F000.JPG)  Never see this before. Anyone can help? I'm crazy now

follow-ups.feedback: Can you try the suggestions in @1994?
